title: patch 6.15
body: How do i change my game set up on summoners rift to where I can choose the lane I want before entering the lobby. it popped up once before and it hasnt since. I like the setup better. if someone could help that would be great.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're looking to get into Draft pick, which allows you to select a main and secondary role choice before entering a queue for a match. You can access this by hitting Play at the top of the client, selecting PVP, Classic, Summoner's Rift (5v5), then Normal (Draft Pick).

Let me know if this was what you were looking for!
